alert.note: Alert for Amite (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 3:43PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Helena, northeastern East Feliciana Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southeastern Amite Counties through 415 PM CST... At 343 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Felps, or 9 miles northeast of Clinton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gillsburg and Felps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
